name: Jos%C3%A9_%22Shorteyes%22_Manuela
text:
José "Shorteyes" Manuela
José "Shorteyes" Manuela was a Spanish trapper and prison inmate who sought shelter in Owl Cave alongside Edwardo Delegato during the Blizzard of 1889.
According to legend, the two entertained themselves by making shadows of the court of Queen Isabella with their hands.
